shri lanka wasthu widya sangamaye sahaya athiwa aarthika sanwardhana amathyanshaye saha sancharaka prawardhana adhikariye meheyawimen idi karena me hotala siyalla me wasare aga bhagaya wana wita nima kirimata niyamithaya.pasikuda sancharaka kalapaye danatamath kamara siyayakin yuthu tharu panthiye hotalayak pawathwagena yana athara thawath hotala dekak pebarawari masaye aga saha marthu masa muladi wiwrutha kirimata niyamithaya.danata hotal idikirima sandaha rajaya samanga giwisumwalata elambaa athi, eheth etharam pragathiyak nodakwana hotal wyapruthi idiri masa thuna athulatha pramanathmaka pragathiyak nodakwuwahoth eewa rajayata pawaragena wenath aayojakayanta laba dimata katayuthu karana bawa aarthika sanwardhana niyojya amathi lakshman yapa abewardhana mahatha pawasiya.karthruta liyanna | mudranaya sandaha

widhayaka janapathi dhuraya, 13 sanshodhanaya aadi me kisiwak janathawatath ratatath kisidu barak ho agathiyak sidu nowu bawa penwa dun unwahanse, janathawa janadhipathithumagen illa sitiye thrasthawadayen ratath, janathawath mudaganima yayi da, eya porondu prakarawa ma ethuma itukale yayi da, eheth niwaradi nayakathwaya demin wides balapamwalata da muhuna demin awashya pahasukam da salasa dun janadhipathithuma amathaka kara yuddhaye jayagrahanaya fonseka mahathage sakkuwe dama ganima thaman wahanse athulu deshamamaka janathawa anumatha nokaranne yayi da pawasuha.ehi pradhana gaurawaya janadhipathithumatath, thriwidha hamudawatath, polisiya athulu eeta dayaka wu siyalu wiruwantath himiwenawa.
